public abstract class AbstractRecordWriter
extends AbstractRecordIo
implements RecordWriter, RecordWriter

      • writeRecord

        @Deprecated
public void writeRecord(Recordable recordable)
                             throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: RecordWriter
        Write a recordable object. A REcordable object know how to represent itself as a Record. This should only be called when the state is Open. Calling at any other time will throw an exception.
        Specified by:
        writeRecord in interface RecordWriter
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is an I/O Error or the state is not open.
